statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%'
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY rating ASC, feedback DESC
SELECT avg(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3.5;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductReviews GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM ProductReviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating < 2.0;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(rating) < 3.0;

SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback INNER JOIN ProductReviews ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = ProductReviews.review_id WHERE ProductReviews.rating > 4.0;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT product_name, price, average_rating FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customers c JOIN reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(review_id) as total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 4 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE average_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_score FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, review_text FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.average_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE star_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5 LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ProductImprovements WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM ProductQualityMetrics;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, star_rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE star_rating = 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT improvement_text, timestamp FROM ProductImprovements WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY improvement_id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM ProductQualityMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_text FROM Review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM Review WHERE feedback_id = 3;
